PowerPC Archive

Camino

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.4/10.5.8

G3/G4/G5

However no longer developed after a decade run, Camino was a great alternative to other Mac web browsers.

coconutBattery

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.4.11/10.5.8

G4

coconutBattery tells you details about your battery, such as cycles, original capacity, and the current mAh levels.

Flash Player

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.4.11/10.5.8

G3/G4/G5

Flash is what is currently the standard (with HTML5 on the rise to replace it) that lets you do many things that involve the internet.

f.lux

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.4.11/10.5.8

G3/G4/G5

f.lux automatically dims your display based on the time and location you specify. It works by using a halogen tone. Turn off updates!

iScroll2

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.3/10.4.11/10.5.8

G4

iScroll allows your iBook/PowerBook to use two finger scroll on the trackpad, similar to newer MacBooks. This tool is extremely handy!

iStat Menus

Download Mirror (not available)

Requirements:

10.5.8

G4/G5

iStat Menus gives you the readings on your mac from temperatures, network speeds, resources, pretty much all the readings you'll need!

Spotify

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.5.8

G4/G5

Spotify streams music to your machine, and you can create playlists then add songs from Spotify's enormous library.

TenFourFox

Download Mirror (not available)

Requirements:

10.4/10.5.8

G3/G4/G5

Based off Firefox, TFF allows you to have cool things such as themes & personas, and sync between other machines.

VLC

Leopard Tiger
Mirror Mirror

Requirements:

10.4 | 10.5.8

G3/G4/G5

VLC makes it possible to play all the media files, and with the latest version for Leopard, you can watch full HD. As of Nov. 2013 PPC isn't supported.

WebKit

Download Mirror

Requirements:

10.5.8

G4/G5

Based off Safari, WebKit is a light web browser. From our tests, WebKit came out on top for speed and performance.
